item.title: Piece Of Paper
item.caption: This note reads: 'A lethal poison is spreading through your body. You’ll die at 15:00. You'll never find the antidote. - signed: A. B. -'

item.title: Adrenaline Pills
item.caption: After taking this pills I feel crazy, they probably mixed with the poison. There are more in the trunk of my car.

item.title: Window
item.caption: I can't remember opening the window

item.title: Gun
item.caption: I don’t know why I bought this gun... But it may be useful.

item.title: My Car
item.caption: The nearest hospital is too far away

item.title: My Car
item.caption: There’s some more medication here! It’ll give me a little more time.

item.title: Shelf
item.caption: This shelf is filled with my books. All these bring too many memories to me.. But there’s one book missing.

item.title: Shelf
item.caption: There's one book missing! I now remember, I need that book to access the panic room!

item.title: My Books
item.caption: The book fits perfectly in the gap... Now the door to the panic room is visible. But I still need the combination!

item.title: Secret Door
item.caption: It worked, the code is our anyversary! Now I can enter the Panic Room

item.title: Statue
item.caption: This is the statue I sent carving for our anniversary. There’s a date written on the foot. “February 16th.” Wasn’t she beautiful...?

item.title: Statue
item.caption: “February 16th.” Now I remember... The date of our anniversary was the combination to open the panic room.

item.title: Locked Door
item.caption: The door is locked and I can't open it with my bare hands.

item.title: Locked Door
item.caption: After shooting down the lock, the door wide opens and I show to have a pretty good aiming.

item.title: A Book
item.caption: I wonder how many pages I could read before the poison kills me

item.title: A Book
item.caption: I'm sure this is the book missing in the book shelf

item.title: Catnip
item.caption: Here’s the Catnip!

item.title: Photograph
item.caption: The cat would only obey her.

item.title: Security Camera
item.caption: That security camera...the panic room! If just remember where it is and check the recordings I might find out where the antidote is hidden.

item.title: Fireplace
item.caption: I used it to warm up the place when she went away.

item.title: Bathtub
item.caption: The water is hot...I probably was about to take a bath.

item.title: Bed
item.caption: It feels lonely here. But I'm getting used to it.

item.title: Kitchen
item.caption: Ok, I'll prepare something when I know I’m going to live more than just 10 seconds.

item.title: Clock
item.caption: I'm running out of time.

item.caption: Nothing remarkable here...

item.caption: I can see it in the video! The cat has a small box attached to its collar. There’s a capsule inside it.
